definition: future days/(literary) the next day/(old) past days
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
the future is long (idiom); there will be ample time for that later/We'll cross that bridge when we get there

sentences.english: That's a long way off but it's not too early to make plans.
sentences.chinese: 儘管來日方長，但是及早打算總沒錯。

sentences.english: He was interviewed during his visit to Japan this week.
sentences.chinese: 是趁著前兩天金範來日時，額外作的訪談。

sentences.english: We hope this mintoter will not affect our good rels in our future dealings.
sentences.chinese: 我希望此事不會影響我們來日業務中的優秀關係。

sentences.english: She stayed at home and looked after her mother yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 來日誥日她呆正在家裏照料她母親了。

sentences.english: Could you get me two tickets for tomorrow here?
sentences.chinese: 你能否在這兒賣給我兩張來日誥日的車票？

sentences.english: There will be a fine day tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 來日誥日將是一個好天。

sentences.english: Try to understand that my age is not long but survived.
sentences.chinese: 試着去了解我已經是風燭殘年來日不多。

sentences.english: If I had money tomorrow, I would buy an expensive car.
sentences.chinese: 假定來日誥日我有錢了，我便購一輛貴的汽車。

sentences.english: I wish you every success in the future, You are worthysuccess.
sentences.chinese: 我祝你來日事業成功，出類拔萃，成功當之無愧。

sentences.english: So Japan had invited Ggong to have his fans meeting there.
sentences.chinese: 所以日方邀請孔劉來日本舉行影迷見面會。

sentences.english: There's still time, the sun just single phosphor.
sentences.chinese: 來日方長，太陽只是顆啓明星。

sentences.english: A few years later my mother was diagnosed with cancer and was not given long to live.
sentences.chinese: 幾年後，媽媽被診斷出患有癌症，來日無多“。

sentences.english: Yesterday his mother wore an elegant dress and went the party.
sentences.chinese: 來日誥日他母親脫着一件高雅的連衣裙往減進舞會了。

sentences.english: We can work out the offer this evening and give it to you tomorrow morning.
sentences.chinese: 我們在今天晚上可以算出來，來日上午交給你方。

sentences.english: I hoped that we should spud in tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我們來日誥日能開鑽。

sentences.english: Happiness comes to those who truly deserve it…
sentences.chinese: 的確，真正的幸福，來日方長。
